books.description: The third book in the Camino series. The last living inhabitant of a deserted island gets in the way of a resort developer.

books.author: Sarah J. Maas
books.description: An assassin named Celaena Sardothien fights to win her freedom and to protect her world. Read by Elizabeth Evans. 13 hours, 3 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THRONE OF GLASS

books.author: James McBride
books.description: Secrets held by the residents of a dilapidated neighborhood come to life when a skeleton is found at the bottom of a well. Read by Dominic Hoffman. 12 hours, 22 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE HEAVEN & EARTH GROCERY STORE

books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: Tress stows away on a ship to look for the Sorceress of the Midnight Sea. Read by Michael Kramer. 12 hours, 27 minutes unabridged.
books.title: TRESS OF THE EMERALD SEA

books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: The 1965 science fiction novel that is the basis of several adaptations. Read by Scott Brick, Orlagh Cassidy, Euan Morton, Simon Vance and Ilyana Kadushin. 21 hours, 2 minutes unabridged.
books.title: DUNE

books.author: Amy Tintera
books.description: A true crime podcast focusing on the unsolved murder of her friend forces Lucy to return to where it happened. Read by Will Damron and January LaVoy. 9 hours, 18 minutes unabridged.
books.title: LISTEN FOR THE LIE

books.author: Shel Van Pelt
books.description: A widow working the night shift at the Sowell Bay Aquarium is aided in solving a mystery by a giant Pacific octopus living there. Read by Marin Ireland and Michael Urie. 11 hours, 16 minutes unabridged.
books.title: REMARKABLY BRIGHT CREATURES

books.author: Jonathan Haidt
books.description: A co-author of “The Coddling of the American Mind” looks at the mental health impacts that a phone-based life has on children. Read by Sean Pratt and the author. 10 hours, 33 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE ANXIOUS GENERATION

books.author: Erik Larson
books.description: A portrayal of the months between the election of Abraham Lincoln and the beginning of the Civil War. Read by Will Patton and the author. 17 hours, 19 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE DEMON OF UNREST

books.author: Whoopi Goldberg
books.description: The EGOT winner shares personal stories about her mother and older brother and the struggles they faced. Read by the author. 6 hours, 43 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BITS AND PIECES

books.author: Jennette McCurdy
books.description: The actress and filmmaker describes her eating disorders and difficult relationship with her mother. Read by the author. 6 hours, 25 minutes unabridged.
books.title: I'M GLAD MY MOM DIED

books.author: Peter Attia with Bill Gifford
books.contributor: by Peter Attia with Bill Gifford
books.description: A look at recent scientific research on aging and longevity. Read by Peter Attia. 17 hours, 8 minutes unabridged.
books.title: OUTLIVE

books.author: Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery. Read by Sean Pratt. 16 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: Bill Maher
books.description: The host of “Real Time With Bill Maher” gives his take on a variety of subjects in American culture and politics. Read by the author. 12 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.
books.title: WHAT THIS COMEDIAN SAID WILL SHOCK YOU

books.author: Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over 35 years. Read by the author. 6 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
books.title: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: George Stephanopoulos with Lisa Dickey
books.contributor: by George Stephanopoulos with Lisa Dickey
books.description: A depiction of the location where and conditions under which a dozen presidential administrations handled crises. Read by George Stephanopoulos, Peter Ganim and Elisabeth Rodgers. 10 hours, 7 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE SITUATION ROOM

books.author: Tulsi Gabbard
books.description: The Army Reserve officer, former member of Congress and 2020 presidential candidate explains why she left the Democratic Party. Read by the author. 7 hours, 33 minutes unabridged.
books.title: FOR LOVE OF COUNTRY

books.author: Doris Kearns Goodwin
books.description: A trove of items collected by the Pulitzer Prize-winning historian’s late husband inspired an appraisal of central figures and pivotal moments of the 1960s. Read by Bryan Cranston and the author. 17 hours, 38 minutes unabridged.
books.title: AN UNFINISHED LOVE STORY

books.author: Victor Davis Hanson
books.description: The author of “The Dying Citizen” and “The Case for Trump” looks at how some societies obliterate their foes. Read by Bob Souer. 10 hours, 19 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE END OF EVERYTHING

books.author: Annie Jacobsen
books.description: The author of “Operation Paperclip” portrays possible outcomes in the minutes following a nuclear missile launch. Read by the author. 11 hours, 20 minutes unabridged.
books.title: NUCLEAR WAR

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Patric Gagne
books.description: Gagne, who was diagnosed as a sociopath when she was in college, reconnects with someone from her past who helps her chart her future. Read by the author. 11 hours, 6 minutes unabridged.
books.title: SOCIOPATH

books.contributor: by Rick Rubin with Neil Strauss
books.title: THE CREATIVE ACT

books.title: I WILL TEACH YOU TO BE RICH, SECOND EDITION

books.title: JUJUTSU KAISEN, VOL. 22

books.description: A swordsman teams up with the leader of a mercenary band to fight evil forces; collects the first three issues of the manga series.

books.description: The 10th book in the Dog Man series. Can the power of love overcome the darkness and despair created by new villains?
